content.raw:
All the tests involving the pr2 seg-faulted in our jenkins build:

* http://build.osrfoundation.org/job/gazebo-ci-pr_any-trusty-amd64-gpu-nvidia/216/testReport/

I've reproduced the seg-fault of `INTEGRATION_pr2`, which happens at the end of the test:

~~~
$ test/integration/INTEGRATION_pr2 
[==========] Running 12 tests from 1 test case.
[----------] Global test environment set-up.
[----------] 12 tests from PhysicsEngines/PR2Test
[ RUN      ] PhysicsEngines/PR2Test.LoadPR2/0
[Msg] Waiting for master.
[Msg] Connected to gazebo master @ http://127.0.0.1:11345
[Msg] Publicized address: 172.23.2.91
[Dbg] [ServerFixture.cc:145] ServerFixture load in 1 seconds, timeout after 600 seconds
[Dbg] [ServerFixture.cc:96] ServerFixture::Unload
Segmentation fault (core dumped)
~~~

~~~
Core was generated by `test/integration/INTEGRATION_pr2'.
Program terminated with signal SIGSEGV, Segmentation fault.
#0  0x00007f4b412d56ec in gazebo::rendering::Projector::ProjectorFrameListener::~ProjectorFrameListener (this=0x7f4a9a495418, __in_chrg=<optimized out>)
    at gazebo/rendering/Projector.cc:217
217	    this->filterNode->detachObject(this->filterFrustum);
(gdb) bt
#0  0x00007f4b412d56ec in gazebo::rendering::Projector::ProjectorFrameListener::~ProjectorFrameListener (this=0x7f4a9a495418, __in_chrg=<optimized out>)
    at gazebo/rendering/Projector.cc:217
#1  0x00007f4b412d5aaa in gazebo::rendering::Projector::~Projector (this=0x7f4a9a4953e0, 
    __in_chrg=<optimized out>)
    at gazebo/rendering/Projector.cc:47
#2  0x00007f4b412d5af9 in gazebo::rendering::Projector::~Projector (this=0x7f4a9a4953e0, 
    __in_chrg=<optimized out>)
    at gazebo/rendering/Projector.cc:52
#3  0x00007f4b412ed52f in gazebo::rendering::Scene::RemoveVisual (this=this@entry=0x7f4b18954680, 
    _vis=...) at gazebo/rendering/Scene.cc:2778
#4  0x00007f4b412f1312 in gazebo::rendering::Scene::Clear (this=0x7f4b18954680)
    at gazebo/rendering/Scene.cc:203
#5  0x00007f4b412db47a in gazebo::rendering::RenderEngine::RemoveScene (
    this=this@entry=0x69e220 <SingletonT<gazebo::rendering::RenderEngine>::GetInstance()::t>, 
    _name="default")
    at gazebo/rendering/RenderEngine.cc:225
#6  0x00007f4b412db607 in gazebo::rendering::RenderEngine::Fini (
    this=0x69e220 <SingletonT<gazebo::rendering::RenderEngine>::GetInstance()::t>)
    at gazebo/rendering/RenderEngine.cc:335
#7  0x00007f4b412e0f81 in gazebo::rendering::fini ()
    at gazebo/rendering/RenderingIface.cc:66
#8  0x00007f4b4160c2b6 in gazebo::sensors::fini ()
    at gazebo/sensors/SensorsIface.cc:71
#9  0x0000000000467144 in gazebo::shutdown ()
    at gazebo/gazebo.cc:236
#10 0x000000000045dc80 in gazebo::Server::Run (this=0x7f4b180008c0)
    at gazebo/Server.cc:483
#11 0x0000000000449d53 in gazebo::ServerFixture::RunServer (this=0xa34830, _worldFilename=..., 
    _paused=<optimized out>, _physics=...)
    at test/ServerFixture.cc:234
#12 0x00007f4b3fda3a4a in ?? () from /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libboost_thread.so.1.54.0
#13 0x00007f4b409d7182 in start_thread (arg=0x7f4b1dcf6700) at pthread_create.c:312

content.html:
All the tests involving the pr2 seg-faulted in our jenkins build:

  • http://build.osrfoundation.org/job/gazebo-ci-pr_any-trusty-amd64-gpu-nvidia/216/testReport/

I've reproduced the seg-fault of INTEGRATION_pr2, which happens at the end of the test:

$ test/integration/INTEGRATION_pr2 
[==========] Running 12 tests from 1 test case.
[----------] Global test environment set-up.
[----------] 12 tests from PhysicsEngines/PR2Test

[Msg] Publicized address: 172.23.2.91

content.raw: the inline comments should help fix the segfaults
content.html: the inline comments should help fix the segfaults

content.raw:
@iche033 @scpeters Sorry for very late response, and thank you for reviewing and making great patch!
I applied and commited it and checked that this work well.
content.html: @iche033 @scpeters Sorry for very late response, and thank you for reviewing and making great patch! I applied and commited it and checked that this work well.

content.raw: now that `filterNode` is a child of `node`, you need to move this if block before `if (this->node)`
content.html: now that filterNode is a child of node, you need to move this if block before if (this->node)

content.raw: can you try one thing on your setup for me? Remove these two lines for creating and setting the `offsetQuaternion` and see if it still works? The offset was set when the `filterNode` is created in `SetSceneNode()` and should remain the same so we may not have to update it here.
content.html: can you try one thing on your setup for me? Remove these two lines for creating and setting the offsetQuaternion and see if it still works? The offset was set when the filterNode is created in SetSceneNode() and should remain the same so we may not have to update it here.

content.raw:
This PR is good without resolving this comment. This can be tested later.

For those new to this PR, the bug is in [line 343](#!/osrf/gazebo/pull-requests/2201/fix-remove-back-projection/diff#Lgazebo/rendering/Projector.ccF343). Quaternions should be multiplied not added. The changes in this PR achieve the same result by attaching one scene node as a child to another.
content.html:
This PR is good without resolving this comment. This can be tested later.

For those new to this PR, the bug is in line 343. Quaternions should be multiplied not added. The changes in this PR achieve the same result by attaching one scene node as a child to another.

content.raw: @iche033 @nkoenig Thank you for reviewing and merging!
content.html: @iche033 @nkoenig Thank you for reviewing and merging!
